attributes.action: Make Eid a two day bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: It’s to make every person together and make it difficult for everyone to feel left out
attributes.background: It is not right that people get Christmas off without asking and Muslims are expected to work on Eid. It would be great for it to be a bank holiday or extra pay to compensate for the loss of time people have without their families

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make Eid a public holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612985
